title: Master Plan: Achieve Full Bazarr Feature Parity
body:
## Overview
This is the master tracking issue for achieving full Bazarr feature parity in Subtitle Manager.

## Current Status
- ✅ Core subtitle management (85% complete)
- ✅ 40+ providers integrated
- ✅ Web UI with Material Design
- ✅ Authentication and RBAC
- ✅ Media library management
- ⚠️ Missing critical features for parity

## Implementation Phases

### Phase 1: Critical Features (2-3 weeks)
- [ ] #1 Whisper ASR Integration
- [ ] #2 Language Profiles
- [ ] #3 Subtitle Quality Scoring
- [ ] #4 Manual Search UI
- [ ] #5 Episode Monitoring

### Phase 2: Enhanced Integration (1-2 weeks)
- [ ] #6 Complete Webhook System
- [ ] #7 Caching Layer
- [ ] #8 Backup/Restore System

### Phase 3: Quality & Polish (2 weeks)
- [ ] #9 Error Handling Standardization
- [ ] #10 90%+ Test Coverage
- [ ] #11 API Documentation
- [ ] #12 Performance Optimization

## Success Metrics
- Feature parity with Bazarr 1.4.x
- 90%+ test coverage
- < 200ms API response time
- Support for 1000+ concurrent users
- Zero data loss backup/restore

## Resources
- [Technical Analysis](docs/TECHNICAL_ANALYSIS_AND_ROADMAP.md)
- [Complete Breakdown](docs/COMPLETE_TECHNICAL_BREAKDOWN.md)
- [Bazarr Feature List](docs/BAZARR_FEATURE_LIST_COMPLETE.md)

## Timeline
- Start Date: 2025-06-23
- Target Completion: 2025-09-01 (10 weeks)
- First Release Candidate: 2025-08-15

This issue will be updated weekly with progress reports.
